identity.name: Controle de Venda
identity.aesthetic: High-Contrast Swiss Style. Data-first. Minimalist but dense.
identity.theme_strategy: Light Mode Default (Best for retail/warehouse visibility). Dark Mode toggle available.

usage.headings: Manrope, font-bold, tracking-tight. Sizes: text-3xl to text-5xl.
usage.body: Inter, font-normal, leading-relaxed. Sizes: text-sm to text-base.
usage.data_numbers: JetBrains Mono, font-medium. Use for prices, stock counts, IDs.

accent.name: Profit Emerald
accent.usage: Positive trends, Success states, 'Add Sale' buttons

danger.name: Loss Red
danger.usage: Negative trends, Delete actions, Out of stock

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Slate-900 (#0F172A).
Backgrounds should be off-white (Slate-50) to reduce eye strain.
Text on colored backgrounds must be white or Slate-900 depending on contrast.

mobile_strategy.navigation: Bottom fixed navigation bar for primary actions (Scan, Home, Sales).
mobile_strategy.tables: Convert to Card Lists on mobile. Do not scroll horizontally if possible.
mobile_strategy.touch_targets: Minimum 44px height for all interactive elements.

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-300 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium
buttons.accent: bg-emerald-600 text-white hover:bg-emerald-700 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium shadow-sm

inputs.style: bg-white border border-slate-300 rounded-md px-3 py-2 focus:ring-2 focus:ring-slate-900 focus:border-transparent outline-none transition-all

tables.header: bg-slate-50 text-slate-500 uppercase tracking-wider font-medium py-3 px-4

badges.success: bg-emerald-100 text-emerald-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.warning: bg-amber-100 text-amber-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.error: bg-red-100 text-red-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium
badges.neutral: bg-slate-100 text-slate-700 px-2 py-1 rounded-full text-xs font-medium

visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, 'shadow-lg' for modals/dropdowns. Avoid heavy shadows.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid Slate-200 is the primary separator. Use borders over shadows for structure.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-lg (0.5rem) for containers, rounded-md (0.375rem) for inner elements.
visual_enhancers.icons: Lucide React. Stroke width 1.5px for elegance. Size 16px-20px.

login_hero.usage: Split screen login page (Left side image, Right side form)

dashboard_welcome.usage: Welcome banner or empty state placeholder

empty_state.usage: Background for 404 or empty lists (with overlay)

motion.page_transition: initial={{ opacity: 0, y: 10 }} animate={{ opacity: 1, y: 0 }} exit={{ opacity: 0, y: -10 }} transition={{ duration: 0.3 }}
motion.list_stagger: variants={{ hidden: { opacity: 0 }, show: { opacity: 1, transition: { staggerChildren: 0.05 } } }}

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is Slate-900 on light backgrounds. Use Slate-500 only for secondary text.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings (ring-2 ring-slate-900) on all interactive elements.
accessibility.labels: All inputs must have visible labels or aria-labels.

instructions_to_main_agent: Use the 'Manrope' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for all financial data, stock numbers, and IDs.
Implement the 'Control Room' grid layout for the dashboard.
Use the specified color palette strictly. Do not use default Tailwind blue.
Ensure the mobile view has a bottom navigation bar.
Use the provided image URLs for the login and welcome sections.
Use 'recharts' for all charts (Sales trends, Stock levels).
Keep the design 'Swiss Style' - clean, high contrast, grid-based.
